Articles.Content:
sup guys since i guess this is the first thread for easter eggs in ksp 0.20

which means

EASTER EGG HUNT!!!

i have a few probes scanning planets with map sat i havent found anything yet:(

have u if u have post a picture

:cool::cool::cool::cool::cool: STARTREKK :cool::cool::cool::cool:
I don't think any were added in 0.20, which makes this thread redundant.

1. Don't spam emotes.

2. There are no easter eggs to be found.
I made this thread back when it came out, natta. Maybe 0.21 will add new eggs!

1. Don't spam emotes.

2. There are no easter eggs to be found.

Not too long ago a mod/dev (can't remember who it was exactly) clearly stated there was one egg not yet found.

One thing I do know with absolute certainty: you will not find it with MapSat. All eggs visible with MapSat have been found a long time ago.

OR! Its not on a planet. Remember the magic boulder?

Anyways, I'm in.
Oh god, what if they actually did add a Russell's teapot to the game if there is one easter egg unfound?

Not too long ago a mod/dev (can't remember who it was exactly) clearly stated there was one egg not yet found.

One thing I do know with absolute certainty: you will not find it with MapSat. All eggs visible with MapSat have been found a long time ago.

Don't mean to burst your bubble, but it WAS discovered, like two or three pages after NovaSilisko posted that there was still an undiscovered easter egg (I would also say itis one of the few true easymter egs in that they reference something outside of the game.

Don't mean to burst your bubble, but it WAS discovered, like two or three pages after NovaSilisko posted that there was still an undiscovered easter egg (I would also say itis one of the few true easymter egs in that they reference something outside of the game.

I must know! The thread is about spoilers, anyway!

I must know! The thread is about spoilers, anyway!

I would post you a link, but am currently on a phone so websurfing is a bit difficult. Maybe someone else with knowledhe of this can post a link
Look at the clamp textures. It is a futurama reference.

Look at the clamp textures. It is a futurama reference.

I believe you may be talking about this post:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/33955-Did-we-find-all-of-the-easter-eggs-yet/page2

Don't mean to burst your bubble, but it WAS discovered, like two or three pages after NovaSilisko posted that there was still an undiscovered easter egg (I would also say itis one of the few true easymter egs in that they reference something outside of the game.

That thread could indeed be the topic I was thinking about but AFAIK the futurama egg was found long before that.

How well known is the STS-115 reference in the KSP menu by the way?
Nova already confirmed that we found all the Easter Eggs.
